titulo: Las Llaves Del Poder - Pautas Para Una Vida Plena Llave 11 y 12 (Texto Completo)
descripcion:
Darío Silva-Silva practiced political journalism in his home country, Colombia, for nearly 30 years, in print and on radio and TV. His newscast had a vast audience. After attending pastoral studies, he obtained the Ecclesiastic Licentiate and founded, together with his wife Esther Lucía, the House on the Rock, a Christian Integral Church, as well as other educational institutions and social services. He is a minister of the Gospel, with ordination from the Apostolic Historical Succession in Theology and a doctorate in philosophy and religion. He has been a visiting professor at the Kouber Center School of Continuing Education of the University of Miami. He is an author of several books of social-theological analysis for Editorial Vida.
The Keys of Power gathers his teachings for a life of success.
